casebody.data:
The CITY OF ASHEVILLE
v.
FROST 170A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 25, 2017 Robin T. Currin, City of Asheville Attorney, Sabrina Presnell Rockoff, Attorney at Law, Asheville, Kelly Whitlock, Associate City Attorney, John Bradford Maddux, Attorney at Law, for The City of Asheville. John C. Hunter, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Frost, Robert H.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 24th of July 2017 by Petitioner:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of July 2017."

Petitioner shall have up to and including the 21st day of August 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
